about_the_game:
The story bundle offers additional quests for Thea: The Awakening.


Enjoy over forty new quests, some linked to your previous choices, some brand new adventures. You can also see all of the events in the event editor and so you can mold them the way you like!

This bundle includes English text only, no localization and no voice overs.
